reviewText: I had been dying to watch Snoopy Come Home this past summer and decided it was time to add it to my collection. I first found this double feature, which I had no clue existed but was so thrilled because A Boy Named Charlie Brown is just as fantastic as Snoopy Come Home, at a local electronics store for $34 and was reluctant to buy at that price. Luckily I had my trusty Amazon iPhone App and I quickly found the same product for less than half the price! The shipping was as fast as always. I am so pleased with this product!

My grandsons, ages 6 & 8, love this set. We use it in the van and it is delightful to hear them laughing and discussing issues important to young boys. I am amazed at how much they identify with Charlie Brown and the amount of conversation generated with each other and with me when they analyze Charlie's hopes and disappointments.

This DVD came quickly, worked well, and was the length promised.  It was the version I remember from the theatre when I was 9 yo (1971!).  Lots of fun to share it with my kids.  Used it at a Bday slumber party b/c few kids would have seen this oldie.
Wonderful quality, brought back lots of good memories to share with our grandchildren.  Would recommend to anyone, young or old.

I wanted to share the magic of Charlie Brown with my four year old daughter. For ahwile I barrowed Snoopy Come Home from our local library. We watched it so often I thought it would be easier if we owned it.

It's nice that this is a "double feature" and included the "A Boy Named Charlie Brown" as well.
Love Charlie Brown movies, these were great!!! Recommend to all parents and teachers!  Great movies to show to students!

My 3 y.o.son watched 'Snoopy Come Home' this past Fall and we've kept it on our DVR since.  Then I saw this double feature and decided to purchase it as it also has the first Peanuts movie 'A Boy Named Charlie Brown'.  My son fell in love with Snoopy Come Home.  It is first movie he sat down to watch from start to finish.  The songs are great and story is of friendship and love. As the movie is from Snoopy's perspective,there is less dialogue. The animation and songs tell the story.  This was our first time watching A Boy Named Charlie Brown, which is about how Charlie Brown gets the short stick in life, but in the end gets a break and comes out on top.

About what you are actually getting with this set.  Each movie is about 90 mins and the DVDs are from 2006, not new, not remastered, if you already purchased those DVDs it is not worth getting this set.  The reason I give this set 4 stars is because I have the Peanuts holiday collection which comes with special DVD features such as additional episodes, CD with some songs, and downloadable songs from I-tunes.  This is just the 2 movies, no DVD extras (which most movies have nowadays - especially those aimed at children).  My son sings the songs from these movies all the time and they're nowhere to be found.  Overall, this double-feature set is still great and worth getting.

We left one star out because Snoopy Come Home was kind of sad.  Maybe it's not fair to take a star off for that?  The plots are slow, like what you might expect from the older works.  We are happy to have added this to our collection!
Very good DVD. My two year old son loves the Peanuts movies and loved this collection.
Good purchase.

I grew up watching this set and rented it recently to see if I wanted to buy it for my own son to enjoy.  I am very glad I did not buy the DVDs.  I was surprised at how much negativity there is from a dog beating up a kid over his blanket to kids mocking each other to a girl spanking a dog, etc.  I just don't think I got all that as a child... But it is not what I want my son to watch.  I will rent the other peanuts DVDs to see how they are...
love the peanuts

I'm not a kid but I do love Charlie Brown and Snoopy. These movies no matter how old or how young a person is are just fun watching by yourself, your kids and/or family. This adult still loves these movies. I love Charlie Brown and Snoopy. Always have, always will.
My son LOVES this video!  He has lots of stuffed Snoopys and they watch with him!  Very happy with this purchase.

The grandkids love all the peanut characters. These DVD came with a great price because you have two for the reasonable price almost for one.

loved theses as a child love them now so glad you had them will treasure them thanks so much wonderful

I first time saw Snoopy Come home was more 15 years ago on TV. I bought the tape version then DVD version, and still show it to children every now and then, sometime even at church. Even there is not much talking, children love it, and it is very smoothing and comforting for little children.
I just feel that kids are watch or reading a lot of fairy tales or dramatic stories these days. But not enough real life story to show them how to deal with real life problem or feeling such as sadness, loneliness, a close friend moving away, embarrassment...
My kids love Snoopy.  We had both of these on the DVR, but wanted to make sure we didn't lose them.  Cute movies.

Bought for grandson and he totally loves Snoopy and Charlie Brown. He has already watched the movies several times. Will more than likely be purchasing more movies.

My 3 year old LOVES Charlie Brown shows. I was surprised. He will sit and just belly laugh at them. So I saw this, really reasonably priced, for 2 longer shows. I remembered seeing Snoopy Come Home as a child & liking it. My 3 year old loves it.
Charlie Brown always entertains. Used to read his comics when I was a boy. Gave this DVD to my children to watch.

Our almost 3 year old loves these....he doesn't make it all the way through usually (they are both fairly long) but I enjoy watching them and recalling my youth too:)  I love how little talking has to happen in these to tell the story.

Two of the Four feature length Peanuts in one package.. My kid loves them both and they're fun for adults too.  Hopefully, whoever owns the rights to the other two feature films will release them on DVD some time soon.
We love Charlie Brown & watching the DVD's brings back fond memories. I bought all of the DVD's for my husband's Christmas gifts & he loved them.
I received my order quickly and it was exactly as expected. Everything was there and nothing wrong. My child loves Charlie Brown so she is excited about watching this double feature.

I really love the Peanuts Gang, especially Charlie Brown and Snoopy! I grew up watching these movies! Every since I was a kid I always wanted to watch their shows every time I turn on the T.V. I really enjoy the movie "A boy name Charlie Brown!" And you gotta love the movie "Snoopy Come Home!" This is the best DVD I ever order! Thanks Amazon!

I bought this as a gift for my mom. She had mentioned one of the movies 'Snoopy Come Home' so I figured I get it for her. I saw this double feature and thought shed enjoy it. It comes with two movies the other is A Boy Named Charlie Brown. She watched it with the grandkids and said it was a big hit. The movie kept them entertained. She said the songs were really catchy. It was a really good price for two good movies!
